# tf.keras.backend.random_binomial

``` python
random_binomial(
    shape,
    p=0.0,
    dtype=None,
    seed=None
)
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/keras/_impl/keras/backend.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.5/tensorflow/python/keras/_impl/keras/backend.py).

Returns a tensor with random binomial distribution of values.

#### Arguments:

* <b>`shape`</b>: A tuple of integers, the shape of tensor to create.
* <b>`p`</b>: A float, `0. <= p <= 1`, probability of binomial distribution.
* <b>`dtype`</b>: String, dtype of returned tensor.
* <b>`seed`</b>: Integer, random seed.


#### Returns:

A tensor.
